Title: The Concert
Writer: Radu Mihaileanu (scenario), Alain-Michel Blanc (scenario), Matthew Robbins (collaboration), Radu Mihaileanu (adaptation), Héctor Cabello Reyes (based on an original story by), Thierry Degrandi (based on an original story by)
Actors: Aleksey Guskov, Dmitriy Nazarov, Mélanie Laurent, François Berléand
Plot: Thirty years ago, Andrei Simoniovich Filipov, the renowned conductor of the Bolshoi orchestra, was fired for hiring Jewish musicians. Now a mere cleaning man at the Bolshoi, he learns by ...
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 6 wins & 9 nominations.
